CustomField.description: Maximum LLM calls per transaction for multi-turn optimization. When tools don't perform DML/callouts, multiple LLM calls run in same transaction. Reduces queueable usage and latency. Set to 1 to disable.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Max LLM calls per transaction. Allows multiple turns without queueing when tools are safe. Set to 1 to disable optimization. Default: 2.
CustomField.label: Max LLM Calls Per Transaction
